Library Reference¶

Here is the library reference for the dota2api package, the parse module and the exceptions used.

dota2api¶

dota2api, a wrapper and parser for the Dota 2 API

dota2api.src.parse¶

parse.py: Parse some of the values returned

dota2api.src.parse.cluster(response)[source]¶

Parse the cluster/region

dota2api.src.parse.game_mode(response)[source]¶

Parse the game mode

dota2api.src.parse.hero_id(response)[source]¶

Parse the hero id

dota2api.src.parse.item_id(response)[source]¶

Parse the item ids

dota2api.src.parse.load_json_file(file_name)[source]¶

Load the static data

dota2api.src.parse.lobby_type(response)[source]¶

Parse the lobby

dota2api.src.exceptions¶

Not many exceptions exist due to server side validation on the parameters

exception dota2api.src.exceptions.APIAuthenticationError(api_key=None)[source]¶

Raised when the API key supplied is invalid

Parameters:api_key – (str) key used will be displayed upon error
exception dota2api.src.exceptions.APITimeoutError[source]¶

Raised when too many requests are been made or the server is busy

exception dota2api.src.exceptions.BaseError[source]¶

Base error used
